div.style: color: #fff; font-size: 25px; padding: 5px 29px; font-family: calibri; text-align: center;

div.div: Our mission is to provide engaging learning experiences in a safe and respectful environment where all students are expected to develop the skills and knowledge necessary to be independent, collaborative, and productive citizens of an ever-changing world.

p.font: Dream ~ Believe ~ Achieve . . . Empowering Today's Students to be Tomorrow's Leaders

div.p:
TONIGHT MONDAY APRIL 27th is our Band Awards Night.7:00 PM
Similar to past awards nights we’ll do our special awards, in lieu of our performances, we’ll be recognizing letter winners, honor band participants, and the Class of 2020.
Please join our Zoom Meeting. I will be setting it up through Mrs. Dean’s account since she has the premium Zoom which can hold meetings up to 300. . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about O'Neill High School Awards Nights

div.p:
Time: Starting Tuesday, April 7, 2020 --- Every Tuesday and Thursday from 11AM-12:30PM throughout the remainder of the school year.
Please e-mail nurse at stephprouty@oneillschools.org to arrange private meeting if needed.

Read more about Weekly Message from NCDHD

div.p: O'Neill Public Schools staff have been provided families with Learning Enrichment Opportunities. Students in Elementary school received packets loaded with activities, while Junior-Senior High School students have been provided learning enrichment activities through online learning programs such as Canvas, Google Classroom, Google Folders, etc. If you are interested in some of the opportunities available, click . . .

03-16-2020 - In conjunction with the North Central District Health Department and our ESU #8 schools, O'Neill Public Schools will be closing all schools in our district until after March 31st. Your child should have access to learning enrichment activities, either through on-line resources or paper and pencil packets to work on during that time. We will continue to evaluate the situation and update you throughout . . .
Help OHS continue to be an incubator for student success. We need YOU to help #OHSgiveback . Find out more here .
